segments.text: I see the girl reaching up for a cookie, and it’s so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, waiting for the boy to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it before the woman notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel her excitement as she waits for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a little adventure for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn around and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation is almost palpable; she’s so eager for that treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
